posts.post_content:
This is such a huge timmy card. Hardly ever in tournament play , even in a deck that had mana acceleration enough for this to go off turn 5 did i get to stay alive or keep this card long enough to activate it's ability. You're better off throwing in some better resistance, like say A siege gang commander if you're running red, than to waste your time with this guy. He's just not a very smart choice in competetive play.  
  
  
**Magasul:** helllkite charger only untaps attacking creatures. If you tapped your elves for *mana* they would all stay tapped.
posts.html:
This is such a huge timmy card. Hardly ever in tournament play , even in a deck that had mana acceleration enough for this to go off turn 5 did i get to stay alive or keep this card long enough to activate it's ability. You're better off throwing in some better resistance, like say A siege gang commander if you're running red, than to waste your time with this guy. He's just not a very smart choice in competetive play.

Posted By: AgesofThunder (11/5/2009 10:12:38 PM)

posts.post_content:
It's cool that the ability goes off the turn after it comes into play, but it's still way too expensive. I'd rather cast spells that turn.  
  
Still, it's a 5/5 hasted flyer for 6 and that's awesome in itself. [Rorix Bladewing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rorix Bladewing)'s extra power was almost overkill, and the charger has the ability. I just don't think people will be using the ability at all.

this isnt a bad card, and its ability will be played more often then you think, you just need explorer's scope, a common equipment, it will flood your field with land and soon you will have enough, and by turn 6 when you can play this guy normally, you want to have an army, and then turn 7, it is pain time with a double swing punch to the face  
  
and if you think of it like flameburst dragon's ability, it is quite good, you will get at least 5 swinging again, then whatever ground troops you have,even their strongest defenders will be in trouble from such a large hit

Posted By: Aww.Gasm (9/27/2009 4:40:46 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
That ability is pretty darned expensive, though really awesome at the same time. Can attack then untap everything to get around blockers in the second combat phase. It seems like it needs to end a game though, rather than be played every turn, since the mana drawback would catch up to you eventually. Could defintley see a game win with broodmate dragons and this hellkite charger though, attack with all, kill all blockers, then attack again for 21.  
  
Nature's will would just be insane with this card if you could ever get both into play. Garruk wildspeaker also, because he would both help with the mana cost, but if you ever got his ultimate going and your charger at the same time you get a double over run in one turn.
posts.html:

It seems like it needs to end a game though, rather than be played every turn, since the mana drawback would catch up to you eventually.
